planDescription: Great discount on your total energy bill guaranteed - every time.

NSW.heading: Get a $200 credit
NSW.description: Credits applied to first bill. $100 to electricity. $100 to gas.

VIC.heading: Chance to win $2,000
VIC.description: Go into the draw to win $2,000. Entrants will receive one (1) entry per business meter on their new electricity/gas business account. One prize only per business.+

NSW.heading: Chance to win $2,000
NSW.description: Go into the draw to win $2,000. Entrants will receive one (1) entry per business meter on their new electricity/gas business account. One prize only per business.+

QLD.heading: Chance to win $2,000
QLD.description: Go into the draw to win $2,000. Entrants will receive one (1) entry per business meter on their new electricity/gas business account. One prize only per business.+

peaceOfMind.heading: Peace of mind
peaceOfMind.description: Your usage and supply charges won't increase for the fixed rate period. We'll let you know in advance before your rates change.

discountOffTotalEnergyBill.heading: Discount off total energy bill
discountOffTotalEnergyBill.description: Guaranteed discount that applies to both energy usage rates and daily supply charges.

referencePriceComparison.heading: Reference price comparison and estimated annual cost
referencePriceComparison.description: # Comparison to the electricity reference price is indicative only and required by regulation. The reference price is an estimate of the annual amount that an average electricity customer in your distribution area would pay assuming average annual household usage (which may vary depending on the distribution area and tariff type). Our Basic Business plan is the reference price for most tariff types. Estimated annual cost is based on average annual usage and may not reflect how you will be charged. Your actual electricity costs will depend on your tariff type and the amount of electricity you use. Find out more about the reference price here.

VIC.description: ^^ Feed-in tariffs (FiT) are paid to eligible customers in accordance with our solar FiT Terms & Conditions, available here. We may vary our Retailer FiT rates and we'll notify you before this happens. Rates are GST-exclusive but we'll also pay you GST if you meet the requirements for GST registration for your solar generation. For more information about the Victorian FiT scheme see www.energy.vic.gov.au/renewable-energy/victorian-feed-in-tariff.

NonVIC.description: ^^ Feed-in tariffs (FiT) are paid to eligible customers in accordance with our solar FiT Terms & Conditions, available here. We may vary our Retailer FiT rates and we'll notify you before this happens. Rates are GST-exclusive but we'll also pay you GST if you meet the requirements for GST registration for your solar generation.

VIC.description: + Entry only open to NSW, QLD and VIC businesses that are eligible for EnergyAustralia's Total Plan Business. Ends 11/11/20 11:59pm AEDT. See T&Cs for entry details. Entrants will receive one (1) entry per business meter on their new electricity/gas business account with EnergyAustralia. One prize only per business. T&Cs apply.

NSW.description: + Entry only open to NSW, QLD and VIC businesses that are eligible for EnergyAustralia's Total Plan Business. Ends 11/11/20 11:59pm AEDT. See T&Cs for entry details. Entrants will receive one (1) entry per business meter on their new electricity/gas business account with EnergyAustralia. One prize only per business. T&Cs apply.

QLD.description: + Entry only open to NSW, QLD and VIC businesses that are eligible for EnergyAustralia's Total Plan Business. Ends 11/11/20 11:59pm AEDT. See T&Cs for entry details. Entrants will receive one (1) entry per business meter on their new electricity/gas business account with EnergyAustralia. One prize only per business. T&Cs apply.

VIC.heading: Account Credits
VIC.description: Offer available to new VIC business accounts only who sign up to Total Plan Business electricity or gas offer. Credits applied to first bill - $100 to new electricity account, $100 to new gas account. $200 credit if you sign up both your electricity and gas as new accounts. Credits are not transferable or redeemable for cash. We may change or end this offer at any time.

NSW.heading: Account Credits
NSW.description: Offer available to new NSW business accounts only who sign up to Total Plan Business electricity or gas offer. Credits applied to first bill - $100 to new electricity account, $100 to new gas account. $200 credit if you sign up both your electricity and gas as new accounts. Credits are not transferable or redeemable for cash. We may change or end this offer at any time.

QLD.heading: Account Credits
QLD.description: Offer available to new QLD business accounts only who sign up to Total Plan Business electricity or gas offer. Credits applied to first bill - $100 to new electricity account, $100 to new gas account. $200 credit if you sign up both your electricity and gas as new accounts. Credits are not transferable or redeemable for cash. We may change or end this offer at any time.

VIC.description: * Offer only for existing VIC business customers who have had an active, eligible energy account with us for at least 6 consecutive months. Not available in all areas or for all tariff types. Guaranteed discount is off our market usage rates and daily supply charges (after solar credits, if any) and applies for the 24-month benefit period. Your usage and supply charges won't increase during the 24-month fixed rate period but other fees and charges (incl. solar feed-in tariffs & GreenPower) may vary. We may change or end this offer at any time.
